feed.title: How-To: Makeup Trends from the 2012 People's Choice Awards
feed.subtitle: The People’s Choice Awards red carpet was filled with amazing gowns, shimmering jewels and dramatic dark, smoky eye makeup. Here's a simple how-to to get the same look as the stars!

entry.title: People's Choice Awards Best and Worst Moments

link.Abstract: Here are some of the highlights from the 2012 People's Choice Awards.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: The people have spoken: they enjoying seeing a wide assortment of their favourite stars accept teardrop-shaped crystal trophies while dressed to the nines (and possibly a little drunk). The people also enjoy rewarding the movies, TV shows and albums that critics tend to ignore. Fans get to choose the winners -- just by spending weeks repeatedly voting online so that Pretty Little Liars can receive the acclaim it so, like, totally deserves. Here are some of the highlights from the 2012 People's Choice Awards.
link.title: The people have spoken: they enjoying seeing a wide assortment of their favourite stars accept teardrop-shaped crystal trophies

entry.title: Celebrity Beauty Secrets

link.Abstract: We've got the inside scoop on how to get the stars' favourite looks. Find out how they get picture-perfect for the cameras.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Want to get picture perfect bronzed cheeks? Jennifer Lopez's makeup artist, Scott Barnes, told InStyle magazine to be careful where you apply the dust. He said, "No powder around laugh lines, nose, or eyes; it adds darkness and ages you."
link.title: Jennifer Lopez - Celebrity Beauty Secrets
